definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cover, cover in, panel (NH [[סָפַן]] is respect, care for; Ph. [[מספנת]] roof, Lzb:330; Aram. [[סְפַן]] Ithpe. be covered, overlaid; As.sapânu (sts.šapânu!), cover, over-whelm Dl:508; sapannu, concealment, obscurity, depth (of sea); Eth.safina: invalescere, percrebescere, praevalere, Di:406);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיִּסְפּׂן אֶת־הַבַּיִת גֵּבִים]] 1Ki 6:9 and he covered in the house with beams (?); Inf. abs. [[סָפוֹן בָּאָָרֶז]] Je 22:14 (rdg. with JDMich Hi Gf Or Gie Co, [[חַלּוֹנׇיו]] [[סָפוֹן]], for MT [[חַלּוֹנַי וְסָפוּן]], cf. Dr:Sm xxx) covering (it) in, panelling (it) with cedar; Pt. pass. [[סָפוּן בְּאֶרֶז]] 1Ki 7:7, [[סָפֻן בְּאֶרֶז]] v:1Ki 7:3; pl. [[בְּבָֽתֵּיכֶם]] [[סְפוּנִים]] Hag 1:14 in your panelled houses.—[[סָפוּן]] strangely = reserved, laid up, De 33:21, and = hidden v:De 33:19 [[שְׂפֻנֵי טְמֻנֵי חוֹל]] (only here with [[שׂ]]; both in sense of [[חָפוּן]] [rd. this ?], cf. Dr).
